original_title: 500 noches para una crisis en directo
overview: 500 noches para una crisi is the sixth live album of Joaquin Sabina.  The concert was recorded live in Luna Park (Argentina) September 20th, 2014 and is composed of the song performed while on tour.  This tour was a celebration of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the album 19 dias y 500 noches in 1999.
title: 500 noches para una crisis en directo
